EmailTemplate.subject: Aerospace.Honeywell.com Customers Are Using GoDirectTrade.com for Free, are You?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
https://www.godirecttrade.com
Aerospace.Honeywell.com Customers have Free Access to GoDirectTrade.com, an Aerospace Parts Marketplace with a Friendly to Use Consumer Look & Feel
Hello Customer, Congratulations, you now have access to GoDirectTrade.com, Honeywell’s award-winning online marketplace specializing in new and used surplus aerospace parts.
GoDirectTrade.com is designed to bring together buyers and sellers in the global aerospace industry intuitively and easily.
Click here : https://screencast-o-matic.com/watch/cq6jrDu3U2?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ChannelPartner&utm_term=MyAerospace_ConversionC to watch a 2-minute video illustrating the buying experience!
Log into GoDirect Trade today using your existing Aerospace.Honeywell.com username and password (free). It can’t get any easier than that.
Check out why Forbes (https://www.forbes.com/sites/davidpetersson/2019/01/07/what-honeywells-ecommerce-platform-means-for-blockchain-in-aviation/ utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_ConversionC#7dfb48d020bc), The Wall Street Journal (https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819?mod=searchresults&page=1&pos=1&utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_ConversionC) and Yahoo! Finance (https://finance.yahoo.com/news/honeywells-trading-business-uses-blockchain-140000375.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_ConversionC) are all talking about our marketplace.
SIGN IN USING YOUR EXISTING USERNAME & PASSWORD (https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/account/login/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_ConversionC)
Best regards,
Keith Doty Director of Customer Happiness TeamGoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_ConversionC]]>
